items.sentence: The only time that I eat popcorn is when I'm watching a movie.
Tom jotted down a few notes while he was talking on the phone.
Tom told me about what happened at school yesterday afternoon.
I was afraid that Tom might not do what he was supposed to do.
Didn't you know Tom was going to be in Australia next October?
Tom told me that he thought Mary still wanted to learn French.
Tom told me he thought that Mary still wanted to learn French.
I wasn't surprised when Tom told me that he needed to do that.
Tom told me that he wanted me to buy a couple of loaves bread.
Tom told me that he was very surprised to see Mary doing that.
Tom told me that he wouldn't do that unless I did it with him.
I can't believe Tom really wanted to go to Australia with you.
I certainly had no idea Tom was planning to move to Australia.
Everybody but Tom knew that he didn't need to go to Australia.
Everybody but Tom knew that he didn't have to go to Australia.
Every time that Tom visits Australia, he drops by for a visit.
Every time Tom comes to Australia, he never fails to visit me.
Do you think that Tom still has any friends left in Australia?
I was very surprised when Tom told me Mary had left Australia.
I know that Tom went to Australia. I wonder if Mary went, too.
